question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. traffic light
B. skateboard
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The traffic light is positioned higher up on a pole in the background, while the skateboard is in the foreground with the silver car, making the traffic light clearly further away.
